item.description:
Hey Everyone!

 

How about a great summer night on a boat! and I can't think of a better idea then to spend a night out on a party ship with friends!  I tried this last year with a group of meetup friends and we all had a BLAST!!  So we are doing it again...Come join us on August 19th for some fun, drinks, a beautiful view of the Piscataqua River and a whole lot of dancing....

The venue for August 19th is a band called "Blue Matter" .  They serve up a mix of originals and choice covers guaranteed to have the dance floor packed.

WE ARE MEETING AT THE GASLIGHT BAR, 64 MARKET ST. FOR DRINKS/FOOD AT 730PM...KEEP TRAFFIC IN MIND FOR FLEX TIME.

 

The cruise is from 9:30pm - 12:00am..Boarding starts at 9:00pm. SO DONT BE LATE! We are meeting at 8:30 at the ticket line OR direct on the cruise. Look for me and Jackie.

We strongly suggest you please purchase your tickets online because there was quite a long line last year.    

                                  http://islesofshoals.com/cart/index.php?event_id=3132

General Admission (21+) $16.00......You are required to bring your ID with you regardless of age.

 

Jen 603 231 7959.

 

This will be a joint meetup event with two other meetup groups: Friends of Jen and Life and Parenting After Divorce.

 

  Hope to see everyone there!!
item.how_to_find_us: On the boat or for pre cruise drinks

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Isles of Shoals Cruise an live band! Portsmouth
